madawachchiya thaleyimannarama dakwa dumriya margaye madawachchiya sita madu dakwa dumriya margaya me masa 14 wanida wiwrutha kere.madawachchiya sita thaleyimannarama dakwa kilomitar 106k wana athara madu dakwa kotasa kilomitar 43ki.palamu adiyara sandaha waya wu mudala amerikanu dolar miliyana 81.31k wana athara indiyanu naya aadhara yatathe indiyawe irkon samagama idikirim katayathu sidu karayi.koti thrastha kriyakarakam nisa madawachchiya thaleyimannarama margaye dumriya dhawanaya athhitawanu labu athara mulu dumriya margayama winasha kara ehi thibu siyalu de owunge murakuti sadimata yodagena thibini.thanin thana natabun pamanak ithiriwa thibu madawachchiya thaleyimannarama dumriya margaya idikirime katayuthu 2011 marthu 23 wanida aarambha kaleya.mehi dewani adiyara matha madu sita thaleyimannarama dakwa kotasada dan sarthakawa idikaramin pawathi..

me hamuwe rajaya da mudal upaya ganimata wadi awadhanayak yomukara thibenu hadunagatha hakiya. 2018 ayawaya sadaha dan danma sudanam wima aarthika katayuthu pilibada kabinat kamituwe pradhanithwaya da usulana agamathi wikramasinhage apekshawayi. 2016 ayawayen wenkara dun mudal me dakwama pariharanaya kara nomathi amathyanshaya gana miita sathi kihipayakata pera ohu anawaranayak sidu kaleya.

dosthara mahathwarunge jiwitha dilidu indiyanuwange jiwithawalata wada lassana wiya haki wuwada indiyanu dilindange ha lankika dilindange jiwana yatharthayan athara etharam wishala paratharayak nomatha.lo prakata wiktoriya sikrats aadi bahujathika sannama wenuwen thamilnaduwe wishesha aarthika kalapawala wahal kondesi yatathe adum masana dakunu indiya gamant shramika gahanu saha dawasa pura hitagena mahana yanthra duwawana kagalla politeks aadi kamhal pihita thibena lankawe nidahas welada kalapawala kambaurana lankawe gamant shramika gahanu athara thibena wenasa kumakda?
